mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.`path`,m.`name`,m.`icon` FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON u.id=ur.user_id LEFT JOIN t_role r ON r.id=ur.role_id LEFT JOIN t_role_menu rm ON r.id=rm.role_id LEFT JOIN t_menu m ON m.id=rm.menu_id WHERE u.`id` = #{userId} AND m.parentMenuId is NULL
SELECT path,NAME title,linkUrl FROM t_menu WHERE parentMenuId = #{id}
